text: Michael Regan (1931 - 8 December 2018) was an Irish hurler who played for club sides Doneraile and New Ireland. He played for the Cork senior hurling team between 1955 and 1959, during which time he usually lined out as a right wing- forward. ==Honours== ;Cork *Munster Senior Hurling Championship (1): 1956 ;Munster *Railway Cup (1): 1958 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Munster inter-provincial hurlers
title: Mick Regan
